short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you read and summarize web content, regardless of the language, improving reading efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Believe it or not, no one can read an entire web page within a few seconds.

However, we can help you make it easier and more enjoyable.
